title: Copy Event Analysis Output
description: Schema for AI output from copy event analysis (copymain.py)

username.description: Username associated with the copy event

problemName.description: Name of the problem being worked on

problemTitle.description: Title of the problem being worked on

timestamp_ms.description: Timestamp of the event in milliseconds

copied_text_preview.description: Preview of the copied text (truncated if long)

content_length.description: Length of the copied content in characters

source_hostname.description: Hostname of the source where content was copied from

suspicion_score.description: Raw suspicion score before percentage calculation

suspicion_percentage.description: Percentage likelihood that the copy event is suspicious (0-100)

reasons.description: List of reasons explaining the suspicion score
